short_summary: R and Python related Training Platform Requirements. Providing computer based training software for Statistics Canada to support the R and Python programming language. Request for proposal (RFT) no. J069346/A-002
description: The procurement involves the use of a competitive procurement process (Competitive - Open bidding) to select a supplier to provide training-platform software for R and Python programming language. The contract will run for an unknown period of time. The procurement involves a small total value of $30,000 to the contribution of departments participating in this procurement. full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Event Details
* [Publication Date](#publication-date): November 17, 2023
* [Tender Closing Date](#tender-closing-date): December 21, 2023 2:00 PM [EST](#note-1)
* [Contracting Entity](#contracting-entity): Statistics Canada
* [Procurement Category](#procurement-category): Service
* [Notice Type](#notice-type): Request for Proposal (RFP)
* [Procurement Method](#procurement-method): Competitive - Open Bidding

## Tender Information
* [Requirement](#requirement): Supply of R and Python related Training Platform Requirements
* [Description](#description): Statistics Canada invites proposals for the supply of training materials for R and Python programming languages.
* [Proposals Submission](#proposals-submission): Proposals must be submitted electronically through [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/).
* [Evaluation Criteria](#evaluation-criteria):
	+ Technical Merit (30 points)
	+ Price (70 points)

## Attachment and Reference
* [Attachments](#attachments): Available [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/$link$).
* [Reference Documents](#reference-documents): rfp-j069346-a (v1.2).pdf, rfp-j069346-a (en-v1.1).pdf, etc.
* [Amendment](#amendment): All amendments to the RFP documents are considered an integral part of the original RFP documents.

## Contact Information
* [Contact Person](#contact-person): Shuo Chen (shuo.chen@statcan.gc.ca), (343) 573-8056
* [Government Agency's Website](#government-agency's-website): [https://www.statcan.gc.ca](https://www.statcan.gc.ca)

## Notice
* This tender notice is open to all qualified suppliers.
* Statistics Canada reserves the right to amend or cancel this tender at any time.
* The Government of Canada is an equal opportunities employer.
* Proposals must include a formal tender submission in addition to the responses to the RFP.

*`Note: All dates and times are Eastern Standard Time (EST).`

[^1]: [Full text document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25205/rfp-j
